title: S3cco
author: S3cco
content: Vietnam Blockchain Summit | 21-22 July 2022 | Hanoi, VietnamEvent Website: https://www.vietnamblockchainsummit.com/Event brings together 100+ world-class speakers, industry experts, and thought-leaders to discuss blockchain technology, NFTs, Metaverse, DeFi, Fintech, DAOs and more. Hear from the newest and most innovative companies changing our planet with over 35+ sessions, including many types of activities, such as panel, keynote speech and fireside chat.Audiences who bought tickets will be sent the links to join pre-event webinar series presented by expert speakers that will give you advance insight into topics that will be covered at the event.EXPO BOOTHS & DEMO SHOWCASEExhibition is an opportunity for projects to exhibit in a cost-effective, and timely way. Booths are decorated & equipped in a high standard way and projects can add their customized decorations to be impressive and unique, not to be similar to others, in order to make a difference to attract many visitors and increases the chance to create an impression on potential customers.Demo Showcase offers start-ups opportunities to present their potential in front of a large community of investors, partners to raise support and a large worldwide audience to get more potential customers.MEET YOUR MATCHSpecial opportunity for startups to meet and pitch with more than 70 top-tier VCs at a speed matching activity "Meet your Match" to shine through COVID-19 and long uncertain times.NETWORKINGFollowing the conference, your contact list will rapidly grow through many activities: parties, lunches, and gatherings, and hang out in the private zone. We will introduce you to people who share your interests and passions.
